lever.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a stick or handle on a machine or piece of equipment, that you move to operate it
lever.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Pull this lever to open the gate.
lever.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a long thin piece of metal that you use to lift something heavy by putting one end under the object and pushing the other end down
lever.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: something you use to influence a situation to get the result that you want
lever.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: Rich countries use foreign aid as a lever to achieve political aims.
lever.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to move something with a lever
lever.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He levered the stone into place.
lever.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to make someone leave a particular job, situation etc
lever.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: Theyâ€™re trying to lever him out of his job.
